item.title: @elonmusk: Nov 6, 2012: Ilhan Omar & MN leaders are on tape arguing Somalis are "nomads" incapable of holding I...
item.description: Nov 6, 2012: Ilhan Omar & MN leaders are on tape arguing Somalis are "nomads" incapable of holding IDs. They explicitly urged a NO vote on Voter ID to protect the "services" and "benefits" their community receives. Verification stops the grift, so they killed the verification.

item.title: @elonmusk: Let me get this straight: > in 1913, the US passed the first income tax to fund ww1 as a "temporary ...
item.description: Let me get this straight: > in 1913, the US passed the first income tax to fund ww1 as a "temporary measure" > now, the US collects $2.5T of income tax/yr > $1.5T of that money is spent on fraud, some of which directly undermines our republic or goes to illegal immigrants If we cut fraud and continue to collect tariffs, we could easily subsist on 0 or almost 0 income tax. A nice thought to think about as we file our taxes this year and give the government half our paychecks. We've become so accustomed to this that most people don't realize the government was much smaller and much less corrupt when it didn't have this slush fund
